channel.title: Comments on: MySQL Cluster 7.4.3 RELEASE CANDIDATE now available
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.title: By: andrew
item.dc:creator: andrew
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../mysql-cluster-7-4-3-release-candidate-now-available/index.html#comment-440142">Joshua</a>.
This isn't something I've heard of. Have you tried the same test with a regular MySQL Server?
Andrew.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Joshua.

This isn’t something I’ve heard of. Have you tried the same test with a regular MySQL Server?

Andrew.

item.title: By: Joshua
item.dc:creator: Joshua
item.description:
I tried both 7.4.2 and 7.4.3, but I've seen the MySQLds leaking memory.
Just wondering if this is particular to my environment, or it's been seen wider?
item.content:encoded:
I tried both 7.4.2 and 7.4.3, but I’ve seen the MySQLds leaking memory.

Just wondering if this is particular to my environment, or it’s been seen wider?
